thread.title: Retail Tree Sales & Tree Services

title: Retail Tree Sales & Tree Services
text: Questions Business Summary This profitable tree farm in beautiful northeastern Montana has been in operation for over 30 years, and is well-respected in the area. From selling and planting trees, to caring for trees, to tree removal and stump grinding, this is your one-stop-shop for tree care. Considering the excellent longevity and reputation of this business that draws customers from a wide area, this already successful business is poised for explosive growth in the surrounding area with a motivated new owner. The current owners would like to pursue other interests, so check out this great opportunity today! The establishment is priced to include $50,000 in inventory, $50,000 in equipment and vehicles, and $10,000 in other assets. Ask for portfolio #209. Financials
